title: Education ministry renovated Margalla College
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 04 (APP):In a remarkable feat of collaborative governance, Ministry of Federal Education and Professional Training has renovated and refurbished the abandoned hostel at Margalla College Islamabad in just three months.
According to the Education Ministry, GIK University will now manage the facility from Monday, offering high-impact IT courses, training programs for students, and fostering a culture of innovation and excellence.
This initiative showcases the power of public-private partnerships and innovative governance, providing a world-class learning environment for students and empowering them with cutting-edge skills.
The Ministry of Education also appreciated to the teams involved for their dedication and hard work.
